academics

Academic courses and teachings during my PhD.

Courses Taken

Spring 2023
  • CMSC828A Machine Learning Paradigms by Prof. Tianyi Zhou.
    • It was officially named Fantastic Machine Learning Paradigms and Where to use Them!
Fall 2022
  • CMSC733 Computer Processing of Pictorial Information by Prof. Jia-Bin Huang.
Fall 2021
  • CMSC730 Interactive Technologies in Human-Computer Interaction by Prof. Huaishu Peng.
  • CMSC828Z Just Machine Learning by Prof. Hal Daumé III.
Spring 2021
  • CMSC764 Advanced Numerical Optimization by Prof. Tom Goldstein.
  • CMSC828L AI and Existential Threats to Civilization by Prof. David Jacobs.
    • This was a one time course and a different course is taught with the course number.
Fall 2020
  • CMSC828I Advanced Techniques in Visual Recognition and Learning by Prof. Abhinav Shrivastava.
  • CMSC828W Foundations of Deep Learning by Prof. Soheil Feizi.



Teaching Assistantships

Spring 2022
  • CMSC351 Introduction to Algorithms by Dr. Justin Wyss-Gallifent and Erika Melder.
Fall 2021
  • CMSC474 Introduction to Computational Game Theory by Prof. Dana Nau.
Spring 2021
  • CMSC472 Introduction to Deep Learning by Prof. Abhinav Shrivastava.
